components.description:
A friendly, cartoon-styled face of bear, looking straight ahead. Depicted as a brown bear with round ears and a tan muzzle. Resembles a teddy bear.

Often used with an affectionate tone. Does not have a full-bodied bear emoji counterpart.

May be used to refer to certain members of the LGBTQ community, a la the slang term "bear".

Available as an Apple Animoji.

Samsung’s bear was previously golden brown.
components.title: Bear Face

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
The unique, feathery ice crystal of a snowflake. Depicted as a bluish-white snowflake with six intricate symmetrical branches.

Like üå®Ô∏è Cloud With Snow, may be used as a weather icon to represent a snowstorm or a cold, snowy day. May also be used for various content concerning wintertime, cold climates, and winter activity, such as skiing.

Sometimes used as an insult to call a person weak and oversensitive.
components.title: Snowflake

description:
A friendly, cartoon-styled face of polar bear, looking straight ahead. Depicted as the face of a white bear with round ears.

WhatsApp previously showed the full body of the bear.
title: Polar Bear
